projects.description: Fire Tube is a relica of YouTube. This is hobby project. It has a home page where you can see your feed. It has a sidebar to choose catagories. You can click on a video to go to the video page. Search functionality is also plugged. Last but not the least there is a channel Page where channel details is available.

The Open Factory is a real time data tracking app of a Kolkata-based startup. It uses mqtt protocol to track data in real time. It is a prototype . It has a total of 10 pages. This app is deployed on AWS.

TweetX is a social-media web app. This is one of my favourite hobby project. This is built upon Next.js framework. It is designed taking inspiration from Twitter. A user is required to signup to enter. There is a home page where a user can see his/her feed. It has a users page where a user can see alll users and follow his/her desired ones. Last but not the least there is a Profile page where a user can see details of his profile.
